CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 2 Yet , the PCE of P3HT - based PSCs is limited by its relatively large bandgap ( ∼ 1.9 eV ) with major loss of the solar radiation as well as low open circuit - voltage ( V OC ≅ 0.6 V ) due to the relatively small energy difference between the highest occupied molecular orbital ( HOMO ) of P3HT and the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital ( LUMO ) of PCBM.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCE: Power Conversion Efficiency
2. P3HT: Poly(3-hexylthiophene)
3. PSCs: Polymer Solar Cells
4. HOMO: Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital (of P3HT)
5. LUMO: Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital (of PCBM)
6. PCBM: [6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester (or, alternatively, [6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyrate)

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are P3HT and PCBM.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

The relevant Material Name entities in the paragraph are:
1. P3HT
2. PCBM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 2 Yet , the PCE of P3HT - based PSCs is limited by its relatively large bandgap ( ∼ 1.9 eV ) with major loss of the solar radiation as well as low open circuit - voltage ( V OC ≅ 0.6 V ) due to the relatively small energy difference between the highest occupied molecular orbital ( HOMO ) of P3HT and the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital ( LUMO ) of PCBM.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCE: Power Conversion Efficiency
2. P3HT: Poly(3-hexylthiophene)
3. PSCs: Polymer Solar Cells
4. Bandgap: Energy gap between the valence band and the conduction band in a semiconductor material, in this case, P3HT.
5. HOMO: Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital of P3HT
6. LUMO: Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital of PCBM (Perovskite-based material)
7. Voc: Open Circuit Voltage.

So, the property value entities in the paragraph are:

1. PCE: ∼ 1.9 eV
2. Voc: ∼ 0.6 V.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. PCE: ∼ 1.9 eV
2. Bandgap: ∼ 1.9 eV
3. Voc: ∼ 0.6 V.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PCE: ∼ 1.9 eV |
| Bandgap: ∼ 1.9 eV |
| Voc: ∼ 0.6 V |
